sys_data_source.name: 07.3 - Insured Phone Migration
sys_data_source.sql_statement: select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.work_phone AS phone_number, p.work_extension, 'work' AS phone_type, c.times_available, i.complaint_id, p.update_date as create_date, p.update_user_id as create_user_id from cacmdba.person p inner join CACMDBA.INSURED i on p.person_id = i.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINANT c on i.person_id = c.person_id where ((p.work_phone <> '(___) ___-____' and p.work_phone <> '( ) - ' and p.work_phone <> '( ) -' and p.work_phone is not null) OR (p.work_extension is not null and p.work_extension not like '% %' and p.work_extension <> '_____')) UNION select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.home_phone AS phone_number, null as work_extension, 'home' AS phone_type, c.times_available, i.complaint_id, p.update_date as create_date, p.update_user_id as create_user_id from cacmdba.person p inner join CACMDBA.INSURED i on p.person_id = i.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINANT c on i.person_id = c.person_id where p.home_phone <> '(___) ___-____' and p.home_phone <> '( ) - ' and p.home_phone <> '( ) -' and p.work_phone is not null UNION select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.mobil_phone AS phone_number, null as work_extension, 'cell' AS phone_type, c.times_available, i.complaint_id, p.update_date as create_date, p.update_user_id as create_user_id from cacmdba.person p inner join CACMDBA.INSURED i on p.person_id = i.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINANT c on i.person_id = c.person_id where p.mobil_phone <> '(___) ___-____' and p.mobil_phone <> '( ) - ' and p.mobil_phone <> '( ) -' and p.mobil_phone is not null UNION select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.fax AS phone_number, null as work_extension, 'fax' AS phone_type, c.times_available, i.complaint_id, p.update_date as create_date, p.update_user_id as create_user_id from cacmdba.person p inner join CACMDBA.INSURED i on p.person_id = i.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINANT c on i.person_id = c.person_id where p.fax <> '(___) ___-____' and p.fax <> '( ) - ' and p.fax <> '( ) -' and p.fax is not null and fax <> ' '
